tradeSeq 0.9.0
  • Get started
  • Reference

Reference

Model fit and check

Contain the fitGam function used to fit the model, as well as functions to check the fit and extract components

fitGAM()

Fit GAM model

getSmootherPvalues()

Get smoother p-value

getSmootherTestStats()

Get smoother Chi-squared test statistics

tests

All tests currently implemented in tradeSeq. All tests are of the form xxxTest. Tests can either be run in an omnibus fashion (all lineages) or on an individual basis (lineages for within-lineage tests, and pairwise form between-lineages tests).

associationTest()

Perform statistical test to check whether a gene is constant across a lineage

diffEndTest()

Perform statistical test to check for DE between final stages of every trajectory.

earlyDETest()

Perform test of early differences between lineages

identicalTest()

Perform test between lineages to check whether the gene dynamics are identical.

patternTest()

Perform pattern test between lineages

startVsEndTest()

Perform statistical test to check for DE between starting point and the end stages of every trajectory.

Visualization

Functions to plot the results

plotGeneCount()

Plot the gene in reduced dimension space

plotSmoothers()

plot the logged-transformed counts and the fitted values for a particular gene along all trajectories.

data

The datasets used in example

se

The SingleCellExperiment object of bone marrow single-cell RNA-Seq data.

gamList

A list of GAM models, used to demonstrate the various tests.

Clustering

Clustering of gene expression patterns

clusterExpressionPatterns()

Cluster gene expression patterns.
